message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. This product is truly top-of-the-line and will bring you a lot of value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I understand the value of the product, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for it. Can you consider this offer?
